Other team members Osbert Mwijukye

Director of Business Development

Osbert is co-founder and director of Business Development and Digital strategy analyst for Lapo solutions Limited Osbert is also a computer scientist by training, he is passionate about software engineering, Marketing and Communications. Osbert Mwijukye has 4 years working experience in the Digital Marketing and Brand Communications field. He has 3 years working with Uganda's biggest media house - Vision Group as a New Media Executive. About us

We are passionate about building a consortium of allies, including entrepreneurs, experts, advisors, investors, and professionals, who collectively advance Good Businesses by leveraging the latest technologies and data analytics. With a wide range of skills, our team includes both locals and internationals who have worked in different fields including, but not limited to, Data Analytics, Financial and Investment Advisory Services, Education and Teaching, Consulting, Project Evaluations, Research, and Technology, among others
